snippet: China’s new leadership is preparing to introduce bank deposit insurance as the first step in financial reforms to be started at a top-level meeting in the coming days in Beijing.
abstract: China's new leadership is preparing to introduce bank deposit insurance as first step in financial reforms; move comes as banks there are ramping up lending and offering variety of increasingly risky investment products that do not appear on their balance sheets.
lead_paragraph: China’s new leadership is preparing to introduce bank deposit insurance as the first step in financial reforms to be started at a top-level meeting in the coming days in Beijing.

headline.seo: China Is Said to Consider Plan to Deal With Failed Banks
headline.main: China Pushes Deposit Insurance in Bank Overhaul
headline.print_headline: China Said to Weigh Plan to Deal With Failed Banks
